Package cluedo.gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccusationPanel
    used when a user picks a accusation move
    ArrowPanel
    Used to show and handle the events from the arrow panel
    CardPanel
    Used to show the current players cards
    CluedoCanvas  
    CluedoFrame
    The main window and where most of the logic for the GUI
    MenuPanel
    Used to create and show the menu items
    MovePanel
    Used to display the available moves the player can pick
    NPlayersPanel
    Used at the start of a game so the user can pick how many players
    SuggestionPanel
    Used when a player makes a suggestion move
